column2: jam, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: 3 yr history of vaginal dryness on & off & yeast infection...pain on intercourse on & off,1st use Vagifem for 1 yr, then  tried Premarin Cream which Pharmacy dispensed lower dose than order...to tired to fight the battle, did as Rx directed, was ordered Estrace Cr 0.01% 1 Gm in 11/09 14 days nightly then 3x/wk, filled Rx for only 1 mo at local Pharmacy as going away & wanted to start. Asked Dr to reorder for 90 day mail order & this time instead if 3x/wk filled for 2x/wk.  Called Dr last wk w terrible pain on intercourse...reordered Estrace 1 Gm 14 dys HS & 3x/wk... I am to see a GYN specialist at University Center...GYN regular Dr wanted me to go last yr but sick of Dr's.  I have multiple medical chronic conditions that require meds or I will be in pain, etc  ...In short these probably cause the vaginal dryness. I am hoping this works.  Yeast infections per GYN Dr & I had no discharge or complaints other than pain on intercourse.  Does this help this problem  I don't know yet. Reason for my uncertain answers. Specialist may put a new light on entire problem.
